text: Lodi () is a historical Pashtun tribe and a prominent confederation of Afghans. The Lodi clans were nomadic for most of their existence and migrated to their present-day locations by crossing the Gomal Pass throughout different times in history. Two tribes among the Lodi ended up establishing their own empires, the Sur tribe established the Sur Empire and the Prangi tribe established the Lodi Dynasty. ==Bibliography== Category:Tribes of Afghanistan Category:Tribes of Pakistan
title: Lodi (Pashtun tribe)
